title: Fact Vs Fiction: Fake News About UP Police, Fake News About 2000-Rupee Notes
subtitle: Did the UP police detain donkeys for eating expensive plants outside the jail? Was a circular warning people about suspect 2000-rupee notes issued by the RBI? Watch episode-10 Of Fact Vs Fiction where...
author: www.boomlive.in
vclaim:
Did the UP police detain donkeys for eating expensive plants outside the jail? Was a circular warning people about suspect 2000-rupee notes issued by the RBI?

Watch episode-10 Of Fact Vs Fiction where Suyash Barve & Jency Jacob discuss the fake news stories in the last one week and how you can spot them on social media.

In this Video we cover the following stories:

From Indian Media To NYT: How The ‘Donkeys Jailed In UP’ Story Went Viral

Hoax: No RBI Circular Warning About Fake 2000-Rupee Notes With 2AQ Series
